name: William DICKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Dicks v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation

parties: William DICKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alan Matthew Robinson, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
Kara W. Haggerty, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
113 A.3d 1229
William DICKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 2015.
William Dicks, pro se.
Alan Matthew Robinson, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
Kara W. Haggerty, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
